data.title: Margret Valdimarsdottir on LinkedIn: Landsbankinn issues ISK 12 billion subordinated bonds
data.meta_description: Landsbankinn recently completed a successful issuance of Tier 2 bonds in ISK, a testiment of the bank’s strength in the domestic…
data.text:
Did you know that alongside the 34th ECBC Plenary Meeting in Reykjavik on 16 May, we will be organising the 3rd EEMI Sustainability & Digitalisation Pavilion?🌿 💻 🏡 Why not come along and meet the 14 exhibitors? They're all pioneering companies looking to transform markets in support of the climate transition! Margret Valdimarsdottir will be representing Landsbankinn, the largest Icelandic bank and one of the ECBC Plenary Sponsors. Drop by and meet Margret at the Landsbankinn stand to learn more about their activities. If you haven't secured your place at the ECBC Plenary, there's still time: https://lnkd.in/evtnw-Rn

🇮🇸🇪🇺The ECBC team is in Reykjavik today , together with our Icelandic friends finalising the agenda for our upcoming Plenary Meeting 15/16/17 of May. Full academic trainings on CB & Housing; CB Label transparency & Comparability; Energy Efficient Mortgages🌱, high level meetings and networking plus Invisso CB Roundtable. All this is ready for you, have you registered?
